attributes.action: Make prescription charges for repeat prescriptions free
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If someone has to have a repeat prescription they should not have to pay for it or subsequent repeats. Often the fact they are having a repeat prescription is that the drug concerned is either not allowed to be prescribed in higher quantities or the reaction to the drug is uncertain hence the follow up precriptions are frequent and represent a significant burden on the person.
